DOC.brief_title: Routine Mini-invasive Electrophysiology Study Patients Feeling Tachycardia , With Negative Holter ECG
DOC.detailed_description: Sykehuset Telemark performs every year approximately 800 Holter ECG examination . Approximately 200 indication tachycardia , 170 patient examination discover tachycardia Patients examine period August 1 . 2004 November 1 . 2005 negative Holter mail letter information min invasive electrophysiological examination , offer volunteer participation . Patients give informed consent accord wait list call mini-invasive EP-study . The protocol EP stimulation consist : determination pace threshold , pace 8 asynchronous beat 600ms extrasystole decremental interval 550 m 200 m . The seri repeat pace 400ms two extrasystole well isoprenaline stimulation .
